Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Tampa Bay in 2009...
Traded from Tampa Bay to Detroit on 1/31/2013 (Going to TB: 1B J. Buck, P J. Jennings. Going to DET: P M. Holloway, P R. Erlin)...
Earned first career win on 4/28/2015...
Won World Championship with Detroit in 2017...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/3/2024 to a 3-year deal worth $4,250,000 per year...
